snippet: Opinions on Russia’s role in the Malaysia Airlines crash, new assisted suicide legislation in the U.K., incentives to keep business in the U.S., and an Israeli newspaper’s take on the operation in the Gaza Strip.
abstract: Opinions on Russia’s role in the Malaysia Airlines crash, new assisted suicide legislation in the U.K., incentives to keep business in the U.S., and an Israeli newspaper’s take on the operation in the Gaza Strip.
